scripts.update-augmented-steam: git submodule update --remote AugmentedSteam && echo [31mSubmodules updated. Remember to update the sha in webkit\shared.ts[0m
scripts.build-augmented-steam-dev: cd ./AugmentedSteam && npm install --include=dev && npm run build -- chrome
scripts.build-augmented-steam: cd ./AugmentedSteam && npm install --include=dev && npm run build -- chrome --production
scripts.build: npm run build-augmented-steam && node ./helpers/clean-maps.mjs && millennium-ttc --build prod
